why.0: When I'm young, I dreamed Cartoonist. As I inspired by Cartoon, I wanted to give positive message to people.
why.1: I found UX when I worked in Start-up team as a designer. I was really into work to consider and develope a User Experience
why.2: I feel both UX and Cartoon give the special story to people. The story is made by the efforts I want to tell. I can do that, I enjoy that. So I decide my goal in UX area.
why.3:
Even though my major is not exactly related with UX, I poured my efforts personally.
First, I read books about UX. I started with design books in my University. I studied for getting my value.
Second, I prepared Exchange Program to take a MMI(HMI) class. I wanted to take that class. Because I want to learn professionally. Also, I felt my insights will be narrow only in Korea.
why.4:
After arrived in korea, I prepared for getting a job. However I got into legal trouble. I had to use a lot of time and mental power. Finally I was almost in depression.
Because I have a dream, I could overcome my situation. I rewind my dream and decided to learn develope again.
why.5: I think life is way to keep finding myself. I feel I found myself by showing my work to another. That works can be pictures and designs for me.
why.6: The reason I decided to learn WEB develope is I want to make my ideas in real. Everythings I drawed and designed was not real. And nobody can see my story.
why.7:
My dream is showing the new way of life to people. I want to make easier way, better idea, inspiration to Users.
I always do my best with humility. I'm junior for now. But I keep studying my things.
why.8:
I said I'm writing dream. Because I write everything when I do everytime.
Whatever I write, I think it is same with writing my dream.
And Now, I want to work where there is a dream.
why.11: 2021s, Books in my room, after arrived in Korea

profile.sinri: sinri(新里) is meaning new town, I found this name from my town.
